00020 /* used to indicate if the query contains a real path
00021  * and/or tags
00022  */
00023 #define HAS_PATH        0x00000001
00024 #define HAS_FILE        0x00000002
00025 #define HAS_TAG         0x00000004

00028 /*
00029  * Makes an absolute path from a relative one. The returned string
00030  * must be freed.
00031  */
00032 std::string * make_absolute(const char *relpath);

00035  * This should resolve the file path, if we have multiple directories/branches.
00036  */

00039 /* 
00040  * Simple routine for breaking the string tag_value in tag and value. If there is
00041  * no value specified for the tag, the value parameter will remain unchanged.
00042  */
